s = r\theta: \begin{array}{*{20}c} {x = R\sin \theta \cos \phi } & {R = \sqrt {x^2 + y^2 + z^2 } } & {} \\ {y = R\sin \theta \sin \phi } & {\phi = \tan ^{ - 1} \left( {\frac{y}{x}} \right)} & {} \\ {z = R\cos \theta } & {\theta = \cos ^{ - 1} \left( {\frac{z}{{\sqrt {x^2 + y^2 + z^2 } }}} \right)} & {} \\ \end{array}
